features.name: cash_on_hand
features.rationale: Cash buffers extend runway and absorb BAS remittances without stress.
features.mitigation: Increase cash reserves in designated accounts before BAS cut-off.

features.name: monthly_burn
features.rationale: Higher operating spend relative to reserves compresses the BAS readiness runway.
features.mitigation: Stage discretionary spend or move payroll to weekly sweeps to smooth burn.

features.name: obligations_due
features.rationale: Large upcoming PAYGW/GST obligations raise the probability of shortfall.
features.mitigation: Top up the BAS escrow account and reforecast the liability schedule.

features.name: forecast_revenue
features.rationale: Near-term cash inflows offset the upcoming statutory payments.
features.mitigation: Accelerate receivables collection or lodge instalment plans with ATO.
